<br /><br />

<h4 class="f16">那个高颜值的毛概老师被网友曝出秘密了</h4>

<br><div class="tips" style="width:auto"><SCRIPT LANGUAGE="JavaScript">spinit();</SCRIPT></div><div class="c"></div>

<br /><div class="tpc_content do_not_catch" id="conttpc"><span class="f18">来源： 晖诚勿思<br><span class="f18"><br>这两天，相信大家一定对那个毛概老师不陌生，她以高颜值迅速被网友们记住了，由此被无数的网友羡慕着，并谈论着。<br><br>但正所谓人红是非多，没想到这个毛概老师一火，她的其他秘密就被网友们曝出来了，让人大为惊异。<br><br>先让大家看这两天对该位毛概老师的报道。</span><br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/5gBsdynk.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>这是她的照片。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/cR1MVa0L.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>她在抖音上也火了。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/xlS2cYYH.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>还有媒体曝出这位老师姓张。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/bcTR5YZL.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>结果就在昨天下午三点左右，有网友爆出了这样的内幕，说这个老师叫张婉莹，曾介入他人的婚姻。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/8WXbJhm0.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>更详细的内情还在后面，比如在原配的床头拍照发朋友圈。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/tdr5eVEn.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>网友还曝出了这个张老师的原籍，那就是河南鲁山。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/GMxO9eFN.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>这是她在男方抖音里的截图。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/JQwB80ya.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>这是网友曝出关于张婉莹的详细内幕，说她住人家婚房，睡人家婚房。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/BEnF6a1w.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>这个网友的诉求只有一个，那就是让更多的人知道这个叫张婉莹的毛概老师另一面。<br><img iyl-data='http://a.d/adblo_ck.jpg' ess-data='https://img1.imgtp.com/2022/10/15/tggzy1lY.png'>&nbsp;<br><br>从昨天下午三点到现在，已经是27个小时过去了，这个叫张婉莹的毛概老师一直没有出来回应和澄清，于是我就将网友爆出的这些内幕写出来，让大家看到。<br><br>也希望这个教毛概的张老师能出来回答网友们的问题，那就是她是否曾经插足过他人的婚姻，又是否住着人家婚房又睡婚床。</span><br>

			<br><br><div onclick="clickLike(5329842, 'h', 't')" class="t_like" id="like5329842">赞(288)</div>

</div>

</td></tr></table>

<div style="padding:10px 0;">

	<tr><td class="tac" style="overflow:hidden; border:0;"></td></tr>
</table>
</div>
<br />

<th style="vertical-align:bottom; padding-left:0px; border:0">


		<br><br>點評<br><hr class="hr_comm"><ul class="post_comm" id="comm95320871"></ul><script>var comm95320871 = {"c2846706":{"i":611860,"u":"船下一群鹅","c":"这位老师，教授毛概，即《毛泽东概述》课程，文章【说她住人家婚房，睡人家婚房。】这是践行毛泽东思想行为而已，活学活用。毛泽东和苏联红军，途经村庄抢劫粮食财富，叫做【借粮】，写张空头支票就抢。冠名【不拿群众一针一线】。","t":"10-15 18:08","l":12},"c2846881":{"i":595851,"u":"唐山小弟","c":"学以致用啊！","t":"10-15 19:21","l":1,"ti":611860,"tu":"船下一群鹅"},"c2852703":{"i":387469,"u":"艾凤捌","c":"借条上点写的是部队番号，等打完仗了番号全换了","t":"10-17 13:19","l":1,"p":"https:\/\/pic.jitudisk.com\/public\/2022\/07\/27\/424232049a089.gif","ti":611860,"tu":"船下一群鹅"}};loadComment(95320871, 3);</script>

<script>
var charset='gbk';
var imgpath='images';
var stylepath='wind';

$('.sptable_do_not_remove h4:eq(0)').append('<span class=serdta></span>');
$(document).ready(function(){
	r9aeadS();
	$('img[ess-data]').each(function(){
		if($(this).attr('ess-data').indexOf('sinaimg')>0){
			$(this).attr('ess-data', $(this).attr('ess-data').replace(/https:/, "http:"));
		}
		$(this).attr('src', $(this).attr('ess-data'));
		$(this).css('cursor', 'pointer');
		$(this).on('load', function(){checkBigImage($(this))});
		$(this).click(function(){
			window.open('https://2023.redircdn.com/?action=image&url='+encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('data-link'))+'&src='+encodeURIComponent($(this).attr('src')));
			return false;
		});
	});
});

function adhtml(tpcHtml){
	$('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(tpcHtml);
}

function r9aeadS(){
	// v20211210 Blocking ads will cause your filters to be targeted and being followed by our technical department, resulting in the inability to display content
	var blockText = '去广告插件屏蔽, 请等待10秒, 或将其关闭即刻恢复浏览';
	if($('.sptable_do_not_remove td').css('display')=='none' || $('.tips').css('display')=='none' || $('.tips').css('height')=='0px' || $('.tips').css('height')=='1px' || $('.tips').css('visibility')=='hidden'){
		var tpcHtml = '';
		setTimeout(function(){ tpcHtml = $('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(); $('.tpc_content:eq(0)').html(blockText); }, 1006);
		setTimeout(function(){ adhtml(tpcHtml); }, 10006);
	}
}
</script>
<script src="//2023.redircdn.com/web/images//post.js?v=1"></script>
